description: Single storey rear extension; front bay window extension with canopy, alteration to front fenestration
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): SKA AR 08 00 02 (Rev. D03); SKA AR 08 00 04 (Rev. D03); SKA AR 08 00 05 (Rev. D03); SKA AR 08 70 01 (Rev. D03); SKA AR 08 70 02 (Rev. D03)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be identical to what stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2025).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
